casebody.data:
NEVADA YELLOW CAB CORPORATION; Nevada Checker Cab Corporation; and Nevada Star Cab Corporation, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Ronald J. Israel, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Christopher Thomas; and Christopher Craig, Real Parties in Interest. No. 74166 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 02, 2018

DENIED.
